BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_MST (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_ITEM_ID,STR_ITEM_CODE,STR_ITEM_ST_NAME,STR_ITEM_DESC,GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_MST T SET T.STR_ITEM_CODE=?,T.STR_ITEM_ST_NAME=?,T.STR_ITEM_DESC=?, T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?, T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=?, T.GSTR_REMARKS =?,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE T.NUM_ITEM_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1),T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_ITEM_ID=? and T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_MST (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_ITEM_ID,STR_ITEM_CODE,STR_ITEM_ST_NAME,STR_ITEM_DESC,GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_MST (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_ITEM_ID,STR_ITEM_CODE,STR_ITEM_ST_NAME,STR_ITEM_DESC,GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? where NUM_ITEM_ID=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and GNUM_SLNO=?
UPDATE PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE T.NUM_ITEM_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
